shri lankawe jathika manawa sampath saha rakiya pilibanda jathika prathipaththiya nila washayen prakashayata pathkirima janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen araliyagaha mandirayedi eeye (30) sidu kerini.mahinda chinthana prathipaththi prakashanayata anuwa shri lankawa aasiyawe aashcharyaya bawata pathkirime aramunin meya sampadanaya kara thibena athara wadakala haki wayase pasuwana shri lankikayan goliya washayen tharangakari bahu nipunathawen samanwitha nidahas, samanathawa, surakshithathawa ha manushiya gaurawayak athi wathawaranayakadi wadi aadayamak laba ganna paladayi sewayak wiyayuthu bawata memangin handunwadi thibena athara eya jyeshta amathyasha lekam karyalaya mangin sampadanayakara thibe.aarthika sanwardhanaya samanga samaja sadharanathwaya itukirima meyin adahas kerena athara rakiya prawardhanaya, sewaka ayithin labadima, samaja rakawaranaya saha samaja kathikawa kerehi mehidi wishesha awadhanayak yomukara atha.shri lankawe siyalu purawasiyanta purna, paladayi, nidahas rakiyawan laba ganime hakiyawa prawardhanaya kirima, goliya tharangakarithwayedi ithama prawina wuth, bahu kusalathawangen samanwitha paladayi shrama hamudawak bihi kirima, wiwidha kshethrayan ha kalapayanhi wada karana janathawage aadayama wadi kirima ha jiwana mattama ihala nanwima, sewakayan dishagatha kirima ha paladayithawa uparima kirima sandaha kisindu wishamathawayakin thorawa sama sewakayekutama thamata sudusuma rakiyawe niyukthawimata purna idakada labadima saha jathika kamkaru nithi ha jathyanthara kamkaru pramithinta anukulawa kamkaruwange mulika ayithiwasikam ha abhilashayan surakima mema manawa sampath saha rakiya pilibanda jathika prathipaththiyen apeksha kere.ema prathipaththi prakashanaya jyeshta amathi diw gunasekara mahatha wisin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha mehidi piliganwana ladi.me prathipaththiya mangin pradhana washayen karunu kihipayak kerehi awadhanaya yomukara thibena athara gaurawanwitha rakiya, rakiya prawardhanaya, rakiya ayithin menma samaja aarakshanaya saha samaja sanwadayak athi kirima ee athara weyi.jathyanthara kamkaru sanwidhanaya wisin manawa sampath saha rakiya pilibanda jathika prathipaththiya sanwardhanaya kirima sandaha wasara dekak thula shri lankawata sahayogaya labadi thibena athara skirna rakiya prathipaththiyak sakas kirima sambandhayen shri lankawata prashansa kara thibe.shri jayawardhanapura wishwa widyalaye kulapathi mahacharya bellanwila wimalarathana, jyeshta amathiwarun wana diw gunasekara, rathnasiri wikramanayaka, mahacharya thissa witharana, athawuda senewirathna, pi.dayarathna, jalasampadana ha jalapawahana amathi dinesh gunawardhana, paladayitha prawardhana amathi lakshman senewirathna, yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahaperuma, punaruththapana ha bandhanagara prathisanskarana amathi chandrasiri gajadhira, parlimenthu manthri sudarshani pranandupulle, shri lanka maha bankuwe adhipathi ajitha niwad kabral, jathyanthara kamkaru sanwidhanaye merata newasika adhyaksha donglin li mahathma mahathmin athulu pirisak me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..
